casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. CAMERON SHAW (14291)

Dupont, C. J., and Foti and Spallone, Js.

Submitted on briefs November 1 decision released November 28, 1995 M. Donald Cardwell filed a brief for the appellant (defendant). James E. Thomas, state’s attorney, Lisa Her skowitz, deputy assistant state’s attorney, and Vicki Melchiorre, Alfred Baldwin and Rosearme Wagner, assistant state’s attorneys, filed a brief for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgments are affirmed.
